translation.en: [man] Last year, Americans purchased upwards of $3 billion in greeting cards.
translation.ko: 지난해 미국에서 인사 카드 소비에 쓰인 돈은 30억 달러 이상입니다

translation.en: with major holidays providing steady profits.
It's a thriving industry where it's often said
translation.ko: "더 나은 미래를 위해" 카드만 잘 보내도 성공이라는 말이

translation.en: the right card can make the day.
if you've got to label me.
I could see her pupils dilate.
"Well, if you're so famous, what have you written?"
translation.ko: '그럼 쓰신 것 중 유명한 문구는 뭐예요?'

translation.en: I just shrugged, then I said...
"Only the top Valentine's Day card for the last three years in a row."
At what point did the poor woman find out you're a hack?
Sadly, it was but a single night of sweated bliss.
So she had some taste, then.
God, no. She was a fan of your work.
By the way, 90% of all cards are purchased by women.
You better get with the program. You're no Taft.
Taft, he was... he was great, right?
He quit cards to write novels.
Novels are for people who can't edit themselves.
translation.ko: 스스로 편집 못 하는 사람들이 소설을 쓰는 거야

translation.en: Cards are still the ultimate challenge.
Sweet talk will get you nowhere.
Mr. Wentworth, Mr. Styvesan wants to see you.
I was just about to ask for a meeting.
Well, who's to say it's not good news?
Styvesan, I'm so glad you made the time.
I've been missing you. Why did you leave me?"
translation.ko: '너무 보고 싶어 왜 날 떠난 거야?'

translation.en: -That's kind of bleak. -Ray, why don't you just--
"Honey, come back. It was my fault."
I'm thinking a whole line of "I Regrets."
-Could there be a song chip in there? -No.
Playing a sad song or something?
No song chips, no glitter-- just the truth, all right?
translation.ko: 노래 없고 반짝이 없이 진실로만 승부할 겁니다

translation.en: 'Cause that's what cards have been missing.
Besides, I've heard complaints about the glitter.
translation.ko: 그리고 반짝이 때문에 고객 불만도 많았고요

translation.en: You know, I campaigned for a stronger glue about two years ago.
translation.ko: 풀 좀 좋은 거 쓰라고 재작년부터 말했는데

translation.en: -Ray, why don't you have a seat. -Let's go retro.
Could be hip. I'm thinking... dime trees.
translation.ko: 요즘엔 복고가 먹혀요 동전 나무 어때요?

translation.en: Girl opens the card, there's ten dimes for her.
translation.ko: 카드를 열면 나무에 동전 10개가 열린 겁니다

translation.en: Could be great for someone you love who you owe money to.
translation.ko: 돈 꿔준 사람한테도 보낼 수 있잖아요

translation.en: You want to put quarters in a romance card.
I'm gonna have to let you go.
We have machines behind you that fold cards, Ray.
translation.ko: 자네 뒤에 보이는 기계가 카드 접는 기계야

translation.en: I'm gonna have to take your guild card.
Ray, why don't you, um, get your stuff some other time, okay?
We'll keep it safe for you.
What are you looking at? Get back to work.
And somebody water this damn thing. My daughter gave it to me.
translation.ko: 누가 이거 물 좀 주지? 내 딸이 보낸 건데

translation.en: Too many things dying around here.
My publisher says it has to be 120 pages, minimum.
Actually, I'm thinking of getting back into the card game.
translation.ko: 다시 카드 업계로 복귀할까 생각 중이야

translation.en: You know, you're honest, and, uh...
'Cause the chase is the key. The chase.
I got a wife, I'm settled in,
translation.ko: 난 마누라도 있고 이미 발목 잡혔으니

translation.en: but I don't have that-- that drive,
You, the love of your life left you.
I never thought of it like that.
[male vocalist] ♪ Well, I searched for my name ♪ ♪ Listing said "unknown" ♪
[man, on television] And on my left,
I've got twenty bucks in my pocket,
Hey, Mr. Ray, I know you're in there!
translation.ko: 레이 씨 안에 있는 거 알아요

translation.en: [newscaster] And the giraffe baby will be at the city zoo for just two more weeks,
translation.ko: 새끼 기린은 앞으로 2주 동안 동물원에 있다고 하니

translation.en: so you'd better get down there.
The governor's office is about to make an announcement,
translation.ko: 주 정부에서 인사 카드 업계에 활력을 불어넣고자

translation.en: one he says will give the greeting card industry a boost.
Have you noticed the flowers I planted?"
They don't heal so fast. I can't ply my trade.
translation.ko: 나으려면 오래 걸린대서 하던 일도 못 해요

translation.en: And you can't write with the other fingers?
You're gonna have to figure out a way to pay me.
You want me to blow you?
Hey, watch what you're saying. There's children present.
I have to watch him for my damn sister while she goes to school
translation.ko: 동생이 이빨 청소하는 거 배우겠다고 설쳐서

translation.en: to learn how to clean teeth,
and it's against the law for me to take him to the track.
And I can't push him off the roof.
I thought he'd be afraid of you.
Come here, 'jito. I want you to meet Uncle Ray.
Consider yourself lucky. Trucks never leave you.
translation.ko: 넌 좋겠다, 트럭은 널 배신하지 않을 테니까

translation.en: But they break down all the time. That's what my uncle says.
translation.ko: 근데 맨날 고장 나요 우리 삼촌이 그랬어요

translation.en: Except he says they break down all the damn time.
[Cathy] Told him you'd be here tonight.
The same. Look, I got a business proposition for you.
translation.ko: 늘 그렇지, 뭐 자네한테 부탁할 게 있어

translation.en: What have you been working on?
some thank-yous, "I'm sorries." I'm-- I'm branching out.
translation.ko: 감사 인사나 사과도 하죠 영역을 넓혀야 하니까요

translation.en: That's great. Listen, I got a little side project going.

translation.ko: 어둠의 경로로 하는 일인데 연애 분야야

translation.en: I need you to write a card.
A romance card, a great one.
Like the ones you used to write.
And instead of using words like "my love" or "my wife,"
I need you to use the word...
Listen, I... I can't promise anything, you know.
There's good money here for you.
I'll pay you triple freelance rate.
I know I said a lot of nasty things about you.
I just want you to know I was just being really, really honest and...
Hey, I might need to get into the office,
get some of my old notes and such, okay?
Make sure you use the back door, the one with the broken lock.
So put the fuckin' money away.
You know, if you had it, then you can get it back.
translation.ko: 한 번 해봤으면 또 할 수 있을 거야

translation.en: Do you remember the first card you ever wrote?
Was it for your mom, or...?
It had a heart on it, and, uh...
What did it say inside, do you remember?
Come back soon. Your son, Raymond."
Come back? Where'd she go, on a trip, or...?
She only had a few weeks left to live.
Like I was supposed to understand that.
translation.ko: 그렇게 말하면 내가 알아들을 줄 알았나

translation.en: I just thought she'd be coming back.
translation.ko: 그래서 멀리 가셨다가 다시 오는 줄 알았지

translation.en: I think they buried her with it.
[Madsen] Okay, y'all ready to get your poems on?
Please stick around. There's more to come.
So, Ray, uh, what'd you think?
Well, your motorcycle tipped over on you.
There was more to it than just that,
but, yeah, that was at the core of it.
Yeah. Well, she loved it more than I did, but...
Yeah, he writes, too. Or wrote, I guess.
translation.ko: 레이도 글을 써요 요즘엔 안 쓰지만요

translation.en: Big Ray here used to be the best--
the Bill Shakespeare of romance cards.
His wife left him for... Harold Lamb.
Oh, I know who Harold Lamb is.
Oh, yeah. So you know the guy that draws Optimistic Owl.
Ladies, um, do you guys want to get a booth,
maybe, um, talk about some poetry?
Bro, lose the bitter act. It ain't gonna get you laid.
Please. Tell me how to get laid.
In other news today, Governor Speakman made a big announcement.
translation.ko: 오늘 스피크먼 주지사가 중대 발표를 했습니다

translation.en: Listen up, everybody. The governor's on.
Today I am pleased to announce
the state of California will establish a new holiday:
translation.ko: 새 공휴일을 지정하게 되어 무척 기쁩니다

translation.en: an occasion for men, and women as well,
to tell their favorite lady friend just how much she means to them.
translation.ko: 여자 친구에게 마음을 표현하는 날이 될 겁니다

translation.en: This was my niece Coco's idea.
We're going to hold a contest
to see who can write the most romantic card
"In an effort to inject new blood into the failing greeting card industry,
translation.ko: '침체된 인사 카드 업계에 새로운 피를 수혈하고자'

translation.en: the governor is limiting contestants to amateurs and...
Look, maybe it was providence you got fired.
You know, what I loved about your class is that you always made us write.
translation.ko: 선생님 수업 땐 우리한테 글을 쓰게 했잖아요

translation.en: You know, actually write in class.
Yeah, that was so I could write.
translation.ko: 그 시간에 나 글 쓰려고 그랬던 거야

translation.en: I know. It was something to see.
I want to see you do it again.
Truth is, I haven't written anything good in three years. I...
translation.ko: 사실 제대로 된 걸 써본 지 3년은 된 것 같아

translation.en: Gosh, that is-- that's a bummer.
Wonder what could have happened three years ago that would have
translation.ko: 3년 전에 무슨 일이 있었길래 감이 확 떨어졌는지

translation.en: I wonder if it was maybe when your wife left you for another guy.
translation.ko: 아내가 바람나서 그런 것 같기도 하고요

translation.en: It's like talking to one of my seventh-graders.
Look, I only see her when it's legally mandated.
translation.ko: 이제 법적으로 필요할 때만 만나는 사이야

translation.en: You're not still picking up the cat, are you?
Oh, shit. What day is it?
You hate cats. You're not an animal person.
Well, I guess I should invite you in.
That's okay. I like it warm.
I don't know if you've heard, but they're doing a spin-off of one of my--
Say, I've been meaning to ask you, uh, do you get a cut
translation.ko: 아, 궁금한 게 있었는데 당신 작품 패러디에도

translation.en: off those wonderful rip-offs I see of your work all over town?
Sure, you must have seen 'em. Uh, the owl's getting the B.J.
Or he's biting the head off your chicken character.
translation.ko: 닭 캐릭터한테 머리를 쪼아 먹히는 거요

translation.en: Yeah. You must have sued those guys, right?
Oh, there's one where two owls are pissing in each other's mouths.
translation.ko: 2마리가 서로 입 안에 침 뱉는 그림도 있던데

translation.en: I must have seen that on 12 trucks today.
translation.ko: 그거 그려진 트럭 진짜 많이 봤어요

translation.en: Oh. If it isn't the only two men I've ever slept with.
translation.ko: 내가 같이 잔 남자는 다 여기 모였네

translation.en: I see you still haven't lost your talent for pissing people off.
translation.ko: 사람들 열 받게 하는 건 여전하네

translation.en: Tell me, when you make love, does he make you wear an owl costume?
translation.ko: 둘이 잘 때 당신한테 부엉이 의상 입혀?

translation.en: Or does he wear the costume?
No one's in an owl costume.
Here's Tony. Give him his medicine and have him back on Saturday.
translation.ko: 토니 여기 있어 약 먹이고 다음 주에 데려와

translation.en: I don't know why the judge just didn't make you keep him.
translation.ko: 다른 건 다 가져갔으면서 왜 고양이만 아닌지 몰라

translation.en: Because you insisted that we share custody.
Why did you leave me for this cardboard cutout?
translation.ko: 왜 저런 정떨어지는 놈이랑 눈이 맞은 거야?

translation.en: For a romance card writer, you weren't very romantic.
translation.ko: 카드 문구는 잘 쓰면서 나한텐 낭만이 없었잖아

translation.en: I never brought my work home with me.
I need the kid. Pays the rent.
Can I have a vodka soda, please?
I saw it on the back of a truck once.
You're not Ray Wentworth, are you? The card guy?
That's all. I just love saying 'Dear wife.'
I'm a weirdo for cards. That's why I come here.
translation.ko: 제가 그런 걸 좋아해요 그래서 이 바에 오는 거고요

translation.en: How many cats do you have?
[Madsen] Okay, y'all ready to get your poems on?
This first one is about my jet ski.
translation.ko: 첫 번째 시는 제트 스키에 관한 내용입니다

translation.en: [Karen] For a romance card writer, you weren't very romantic.
translation.ko: 카드 문구는 잘 쓰면서 나한텐 낭만이 없었잖아

translation.en: [Buddy] You gotta forget about Karen. You gotta let her go.
[Madsen] Big Ray here used to be the best,
the Bill Shakespeare of romance cards.
[Buddy] You're not still picking up the cat, are you?
"I'm with you in hard times especially.
Look for me in your heart.
That is so sad, don't you think?
That's a person who's asking for so little.
You still got that awesome tattoo?
Yeah. Seeing how awful these are is a real pick-me-up.
translation.ko: 네, 이 정도로도 팔린다면 해볼 만하겠는데요

translation.en: You don't walk around all the time in a red smock with a name tag?
translation.ko: 빨간 앞치마에 이름표 달고 그냥 돌아다니는 거 아니고요?

translation.en: They bum me out with their upbeat attitude.
translation.ko: 그런 태도 때문에 더 기분이 나빠지거든요

translation.en: All they ever do is make me feel more alone.
So, why did you quit writing?
I just quit being good at it.
Yeah, well, you'll get it back.
You gotta have the feelings first, and then you can write about them.
translation.ko: 일단 감정을 되찾으면 다시 잘 써질 거예요

translation.en: Hey, um, do you think that--
I like to get that shit over with.
Who did this to you? What are you doing here?
translation.ko: 누가 이런 거야? 여긴 왜 온 거고?

translation.en: What, are you working for Paper Hearts?
I think very highly of you, too.
You've heard the expression 'penny for your thoughts.'
translation.ko: '우는 아기 떡 하나 더 준다는 말 알지?'

translation.en: Well, here are ten dimes for your thoughts.
Signed, the numb-nuts that's dating you."
I'm Detective fucking Miller, fucking Homicide, that's who I am.
What kind of cards you write, Wentworth?
So every time I forget to give
one of your mushy-ass cards to my girl,
I get cut off for a month.
Perhaps if you were well-endowed, you wouldn't need one of my cards.
translation.ko: 물건만 실하면 카드 따윈 필요도 없죠

translation.en: You punched me in the throat!
One of your butt buddies was found in the river this morning
translation.ko: 아저씨 불알친구가 오늘 아침 강에서 발견됐소

translation.en: with a bunch of water where his internal organs used to be.
translation.ko: 장기는 하나도 없고 배에 물만 찼더군

translation.en: Shouldn't I be asking you that?
-You think that I--? -He was your competition, right?
You got somebody watching over you.
You get out your feather pen,
and you write a nice little card
that'll open my girlfriend's legs again.
I might consider dropping your bloody shirt at the dry cleaners.
translation.ko: 피 묻은 당신 옷은 드라이 맡기고

translation.en: And tossing that blade in the river.
[newscaster] Police have identified the body as one Orwell G. Taft,
Nothing more is known at this time.
translation.ko: 현재 더 이상 밝혀진 바는 없습니다

translation.en: He probably had a second family somewhere.
translation.ko: 아마 두 집 살림을 했을 거야

translation.en: Or he was an S&M junkie,
liked to be whipped and kicked around
or held underwater to get his jollies.
Why is everybody so much more depressed than usual?
translation.ko: 왜 다들 평소보다 더 우울해 보여?

translation.en: Jeez Louise, Mr. Wentworth, did you get into a car accident?
It hit me in the face. Somebody's shoe.
They found him floating in the river this morning.
Another one bites the dust, huh?
-Hey. -Oh. Sorry. Something happened to my face.
Do you want to drink about it?
I think I'd better not tonight.
Um, I... I brought you something.
I hope it comforts your face.
Uh, and my phone number's on the bottom of it.
My sister dragged his ass back to Chicago,
Oh-- uh, I got an idea.
How about a yard sale, then?
You can put price tags on everything here.
Uh, this couch. My bed frame.
That's a thousand bucks right there.
I got all this small stuff, like the kitchenware
You put all that on one card table right in the middle of the room
and a little sign that says,

translation.ko: '이 위에 있는 건 다 합해서 백 달러'

translation.en: I mean, well, name your price.
Well, see, I still-- I get to live here while it goes on.
translation.ko: 물건 다 팔 때까지 여기 살면 되죠

translation.en: It's kind of like a living showroom.
Did you hear about that writer who, uh--
Well, he didn't swim very good.
Very well. He didn't swim very well.
translation.ko: 못 한 거지 잘못한 게 아니라

translation.en: You teach English with that mouth?
I think it has something to do with this, uh...
They're killing people over a new holiday?
Follow the money. It's-- I saw it in a movie once.
Hey, but if you're actually worried, you know, you can move out to the 'burbs.
Get you a job teaching Driver's Ed. Speed things up.
translation.ko: 운전 강사로 일하시면 더 빠를 수도 있어요

translation.en: [minister] And we have come to the moment in our service
where we can go no farther,
and stand on the edge of a chasm,
[minister] Our God, we are grateful that Orwell...
Guess his novel wasn't working out, so he gave up.
translation.ko: 소설이 잘 안 풀려서 결국 놔버렸나 봐

translation.en: [minister] And we know that he is wrapped tight...
I think he was writing a card for this new holiday.
translation.ko: 태프트도 새 공휴일 기념 카드를 쓰고 있었나 봐요

translation.en: What are you--? No one's getting killed over this, Ray.
We're talking about a card here.
[minister] ...grateful that he now sings with angels...
...wrapped tight in the arms and the bosom of Abraham...
I don't know, I just work here.
It's professional curiosity. Taft and I worked together.
Your husband was the writer I always measured myself against.
translation.ko: 항상 태프트를 제 비교 상대로 삼았어요

translation.en: And I always came up short.
won me over with a card.
I'm afraid I wasn't the greatest prize.
translation.ko: 제가 그 사람에겐 최고가 아니었나 봐요

translation.en: Did you attend the company picnics, huh? Christmas party?
translation.ko: 회사 야유회엔 안 가셨어요? 크리스마스 파티나

translation.en: Right. Now, wait, you're in the greetings industry.
Romance, purely. I don't have time for that other shit.
translation.ko: 전 연인용 카드만 씁니다 쓸데없이 다른 데는 신경 안 써요

translation.en: You tell me, was he writing a card for this new holiday?
translation.ko: "사랑해요, 내 사랑" 태프트도 새 공휴일용으로 카드를 썼나요?

translation.en: -Who was he working for? -Gundy, of course.
No, come on. Not Robert Gundy.
Dillon, his brother, the owner of Paper Hearts.
translation.ko: 페이퍼 하트 사장 딜런이 그분 형이에요

translation.en: I've just been feeling so lonely,
without Orwell's voice buzzing in the air, you know?
-Clomping around. -Listen, can I use your back door?
Yeah, of your house. Can I use it?
What are you doing with the lady, huh?
I don't have to tell you anything. Now, where's the card?
Get to it, or I might have to find my favorite bloody shirt.
translation.ko: 빨리 안 하면 피 묻은 옷 도로 가져온다

translation.en: Take a picture. It'll last longer.
We wouldn't care if you was, mister.
I'm Betcher. This here's Adolph Haggert.
Call him Sonnyboy. He don't like Adolph no more.
translation.ko: 아돌프라는 이름이 싫어서 이젠 서니보이라고 해

translation.en: I spent two years in a maximum security prison
translation.ko: 증오 범죄 누명을 쓰고 중범죄자 교도소에서

translation.en: for a hate crime I did not commit.
It was planned as a hate crime.
I couldn't get that fucking cross into the ground.
It's a lot tougher than it looks.
hating a whole race of folks, now that's an awful lot of work.
So you don't hate anyone now?
So, who do you hate now?
You know what them are, fancy man?
Them's people think they're better than other people.
I got news for you: They ain't!
Nobody's better than nobody, that's our motto these days.
translation.ko: 사람은 다 똑같아 그게 우리 신조야

translation.en: And if you think you is, we'll fuck you up till you isn't.
translation.ko: 당신도 잘난 척했다간 다신 못하게 해주지

translation.en: Good to finally meet you, Mr. Wentworth.
My wrist is still a little broken.
My goodness. Your lip-- looks like fresh blood.
I hope you don't mind watching me eat. I'm famished.
translation.ko: 괜찮으시면 식사 좀 하겠습니다 배가 너무 고파서요

translation.en: Can I offer you a beer?

translation.ko: 약 먹어야 해서요 한 잔 주시면 좋죠

translation.en: A beer for Mr. Wentworth, please.
translation.ko: 웬트워스 씨에게 맥주 한 잔 드리게

translation.en: Napoleon gave it to his mother
after she had a tumor removed from her ankle.
translation.ko: 발목 종양 제거 수술을 받은 어머니께 보낸 거죠

translation.en: It's French, and it translates into, "Feel better."
She died two days after receiving it.
translation.ko: 카드를 받고 이틀 후 어머니가 돌아가셨대요

translation.en: Sit down, Mr. Wentworth, let's talk.
No, no, no. No, that belongs to my brother, Dilly.
translation.ko: 아, 거긴 우리 형 딜리가 맡은 곳이죠

translation.en: Well, Mr. Wentworth, they tell me that you were Card Writer of the Year
Also that you're divorced, you live alone,
and you like to watch Bumfights.
What can you see in them, I wonder!
They make me feel better somehow.
He was writing a card for your brother's company.
They found him floating facedown in the river.
Oh, yes, yes. It was tragic.
Styvesan told me that he was a very skilled writer,
Said there was only one ever better.
translation.ko: 그 친구보다 잘하는 사람은 딱 하나뿐이었다더군요

translation.en: Yeah, well, his wife is distraught.
Someone ought to send her a card.
That is a hefty accusation, Mr. Wentworth.
Perhaps you should take that up with the police.
The word is, you have a sweetheart, Mr. Wentworth.
Detective Miller. He works for me on the side.
translation.ko: 밀러 형사가 부업으로 내 일을 봐줍니다

translation.en: I thought Styvesan worked for you.
That's good, that's very good. I mean, after all,
you need to feel the feelings before you can write about them.
translation.ko: 어떤 감정이 필요한지 직접 느끼는 게 중요하니까요

translation.en: So I write the card for her and I give it to you. That doesn't seem fair.
translation.ko: 애인 생각하면서 쓴 카드를 당신에게 넘기긴 싫은데요

translation.en: Well, my father used to say, "Fair is where you end up."
translation.ko: 부친께선 늘 살다 보면 다 그런 거라고 하셨습니다

translation.en: I have a sixth sense about these things, Mr. Wentworth.
You've been a fool for love before.
translation.ko: 당신도 한때는 사랑에 미친 적이 있었죠

translation.en: You've got the gene for it.
No, I'm a cynic. You're cynical. There's a difference.
translation.ko: 상처받아서 회의가 든 거지 원래 안 믿는 것과는 다르죠

translation.en: I never believed in the first place, but you,
you wake up every morning disappointed to find the world the way it is
I mean, they're made out of real... plastic.
But, uh, if you have a magic act, they can--
I can water them with soda pop.
They're beautiful. They-- they smell funny.
Here you go. Look at this.
Oh, that's my, uh, collection of ugly purses.
Baby shoes. Um... who do those belong to?
Yeah, those-- those are actually mine.
Last couple of years, I've been...
looking for those feelings, and, uh...
Why don't you write me a card and tell me all about it?
Sorry for calling you so early.
You kidding me? I've been up since 5:30 a.m.
How many fish did you catch?
Ray! Tell me you got something for me!
I did it. It's the best I ever wrote. It-- it's pithy and it's sweet.
translation.ko: 네, 최고의 작품이 나왔어요 간단명료하면서도 달달함이 넘쳐요

translation.en: It's got heart, and after this, I'm done, okay?
translation.ko: 진심도 담겼고요 전 이제 손 떼는 겁니다

translation.en: Yeah. The real one's right here. You can't have it.
translation.ko: 네, 진짜는 여기 있어요 안 드릴 겁니다

translation.en: You can't have it! I didn't write it for you.
translation.ko: 당신 주려고 쓴 거 아니니까 안 줄 거야!

translation.en: I'm gonna give it to the person I wrote it for,
and you can suck my dick, okay?
Hey. You up for some spaghetti and booze?
I know this is impromptu, but this is...

translation.ko: '진짜 샴페인 맛의 알코올 음료'를 사 왔어요 이거...

translation.en: -Ray, I-I don't think-- -Don't worry. It's done.
I'm not giving it to anyone. Just you.
translation.ko: 아무도 안 줄 거예요 당신 거예요

translation.en: Because I wrote it for you.
I'd love a gander at that, if you're done.
So, it was a chick that did the trick, huh?
Well, Gundy figured one of us would get it.
translation.ko: 건디가 우리 둘 중 하나면 될 줄 알았나 보네

translation.en: Nice job, huh? Well, beauty wins. Whatever.
All right, let's see what gay sentence turned on the lady's faucets.
translation.ko: 남자 밝히는 줄 알았는데 여자를 어떻게 홀렸는지 볼까

translation.en: -Where's the damn card? -You got it, fancy pants?

translation.ko: 어디 있는 거야? 카드 어디 있어?

translation.en: He's still got it in his mind.
Hey, what are we waiting for?
You know, I got a card when I got out of prison one time,
translation.ko: 나도 옛날에 출소해서 카드 받아본 적 있어

translation.en: with brains, muscles, looks, and girls chasing you...
translation.ko: '머리도 좋고, 몸도 좋고 잘생겨서 여자도 줄을 서니'

translation.en: Styvesan told the boss that you did have it.
He said that you said that it was your best card ever.
Ask the woman. She saw it.
Then you're gonna have to say what was on it.
Hey, what's the worst place you can get a papercut?
Ooh, how about the pee hole?
-That's it, the eye. -Yeah, right on the eyeball.
Tell 'em what the card said. Just tell them. Why does it even matter?
translation.ko: 그냥 말해요 이제 아무 상관 없잖아요

translation.en: 'Cause. You got paid to be with me.
You know what that makes you? A whore.
Oh, language! There's a child present.
I'm sorry, I'm afraid it's Take Your Daughter To Work Day,
and I guess I take even the most off-brand holiday seriously.
translation.ko: 별 시답잖은 공휴일에 나만 죽자고 덤빈 것 같군요

translation.en: Ellie, that's enough. You'll see Auntie Jill soon enough.
translation.ko: 엘리, 이제 됐어 고모랑은 이따가 놀자

translation.en: Adolph, would you kindly escort my daughter outside and sit with her?
translation.ko: 아돌프, 내 딸 데리고 잠시 나가주겠나?

translation.en: Well, stop looking at me like I'm a donut and keep my daughter company!
translation.ko: 그렇게 뚫어지게 쳐다보지 말고 내 딸이나 챙겨!

translation.en: Look at the clouds. There's some fascinating shapes today.
Now, let's us adults have some straight talk.
Taft was writing a card for my competition.
I learned long ago, never let the trappings of shared DNA
translation.ko: DNA 좀 섞였다고 사업에 지장을 주면

translation.en: -All this for a fucking card? -Shut up!
translation.ko: - 카드 하나 때문에? - 뭘 안다고 나서?

translation.en: Is your brother as crazy as you are?
My brother had everything handed to him.
The blind luck of the firstborn. But not me, Mr. Wentworth.
I had to fight and claw my way for everything.
Come on, Raymond, he was your competition.
Why did you have to kill him?
what do you know about holidays?
Fourth of July? Nothing less than a war.
A woman goes through nine months of excruciating pregnancy,
translation.ko: 여자가 열 달을 고생하며 아기를 품다가

translation.en: and tops it off with a small human awash in her own blood.
translation.ko: 자기 피를 쏟아가며 엄마가 되는 거잖아

translation.en: And what did it take to have Christmas and Easter?
Biggest holidays of them all, the top two.
It took the greatest man who ever lived
translation.ko: 십자가에 못 박혀 죽은 지구상 가장 위대한 사람을

translation.en: Do you understand, Mr. Wentworth? It's all about sacrifice.
The universe cries out for sacrifice,
and I'm simply following the template.
when my junky nephew and Jill bore a child,
translation.ko: 약쟁이 내 조카와 질 사이에 생긴 아이를

translation.en: I simply wanted to have the little bean brought up properly.
Of course, I was foolish enough to let her stay in the child's life.
translation.ko: 아이를 계속 만나게 하는 게 아니었는데

translation.en: It was a tangled web indeed,
but now I intend to clear the situation up,
You get the card, Jill gets the girl.
translation.ko: 카드를 줄 테니 아이는 엄마한테 보내

translation.en: That child is going to grow up knowing herself
in a higher class than she was born to.
I intend for her to have the best and be the best,
and she will never hear a whisper
of her no-account, drug addict birth father
or her whore of a mother.
[Ray] After all that, I gave them the damn card.
They found a nice, cheery front to sell it, and that did the trick.
translation.ko: 그럴싸한 얼굴마담을 찾아 내보냈더니 잘 먹혔고요 "걸프렌드 데이 경연 대회 우승자"

translation.en: Made people feel good, I guess,
the kind of good feeling some dumb card can give you.
translation.ko: 카드 하나로 느낄 수 있는 좋은 기분으로요

translation.en: I don't sell my feelings anymore, either.
I'm saving 'em up for somebody special.
-What, did I do something wrong? -No, no, no. Pull up a little bit.
